channel.title: General Design Wordpress Blogging Pro Theme on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in General Design Wordpress Blogging Pro Theme on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: New theme
item.description: I got tired of the old theme, so I sat down tonight and modified the heck out of the blogging pro theme to make it more my own. I like how it turned out. I think that there are still a few hacks and tweaks I will have to incorporate - but I like the feel. I still need to figure out if I want to add ads. I probably should, since my blog is growing a bit, but I just hate having ads  - so maybe I will concentrate on making my other sites make money.
